Description: Chubb Arabia Cooperative Insurance Co (known as: Chubb) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since July 2009. Chubb operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. Chubb is based in Khobar, Saudi Arabia and was established in May 2008.
